title: Announcement: Spooked Continues Every Other Friday
description:
It’s true; there are more all-new Spooked stories ahead, stories that haven’t been heard before. Stick around listeners. Follow this feed. Season 6 runs through May 2022.

To listen to all new Spooked episodes as they’re released, subscribe to Luminary directly, or to the Luminary Channel on Apple Podcasts. Either way, just go to luminary.link/spooked
itunes:subtitle: It’s true; there are more all-new Spooked stories ahead, stories that haven’t been heard before. Stick around listeners. Follow this feed. Season 6 just got frighteningly long.
author: stats@snapjudgment.org (Snap Judgment)
